rules.name: myRule_5
rules.label: Belliss Case Closes - Extended Wear Checked

Flow.description: When a Belliss case closes create a new one to be worked on 6 months from the Date Complete date.

value.stringValue: DATE( YEAR( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) + FLOOR( ( MONTH ( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) + 6 - 1 ) / 12 ), MOD( MONTH ( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) + 6 - 1 + IF( DAY ( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) > CASE( MOD( MONTH( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) + 6 - 1, 12 ) + 1, 2, 28, 4, 30, 6, 30, 9, 30, 11, 30, 31 ), 1, 0 ), 12 ) + 1, IF( DAY( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) > CASE( MOD( MONTH( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) + 6 - 1, 12 ) + 1, 2, 28, 4, 30, 6, 30, 9, 30, 11, 30, 31 ), 1, DAY( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) ) )

formulas.name: formula_6_myRule_5_A1_1962986716
formulas.expression: DATE( YEAR( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) + FLOOR( ( MONTH ( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) + 6 - 1 ) / 12 ), MOD( MONTH ( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) + 6 - 1 + IF( DAY ( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) > CASE( MOD( MONTH( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) + 6 - 1, 12 ) + 1, 2, 28, 4, 30, 6, 30, 9, 30, 11, 30, 31 ), 1, 0 ), 12 ) + 1, IF( DAY( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) > CASE( MOD( MONTH( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) + 6 - 1, 12 ) + 1, 2, 28, 4, 30, 6, 30, 9, 30, 11, 30, 31 ), 1, DAY( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) ) )

value.stringValue: IF([Case].Extended_Wear__c = FALSE, DATE( YEAR( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) + FLOOR( ( MONTH ( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) + 6 - 1 ) / 12 ), MOD( MONTH ( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) + 6 - 1 + IF( DAY ( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) > CASE( MOD( MONTH( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) + 6 - 1, 12 ) + 1, 2, 28, 4, 30, 6, 30, 9, 30, 11, 30, 31 ), 1, 0 ), 12 ) + 1, IF( DAY([Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) > CASE(MOD(MONTH([Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) + 6 - 1, 12 ) + 1, 2, 28, 4, 30, 6, 30, 9, 30, 11, 30, 31 ), 1, DAY( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) ) ), DATE( YEAR( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) + FLOOR( ( MONTH ( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) + 12 - 1 ) / 12 ), MOD( MONTH ( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) + 12 - 1 + IF( DAY ( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) > CASE( MOD( MONTH( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) + 12 - 1, 12 ) + 1, 2, 28, 4, 30, 6, 30, 9, 30, 11, 30, 31 ), 1, 0 ), 12 ) + 1, IF( DAY( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) > CASE( MOD( MONTH( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) + 12 - 1, 12 ) + 1, 2, 28, 4, 30, 6, 30, 9, 30, 11, 30, 31 ), 1, DAY( [Case].Work_Completed_Date__c ) ) ) )

formulas.name: formula_9_myRule_8_A1_2530652662
formulas.expression: IF({!myVariable_current.Extended_Wear__c} = FALSE, DATE( YEAR( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) + FLOOR( ( MONTH ( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) + 6 - 1 ) / 12 ), MOD( MONTH ( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) + 6 - 1 + IF( DAY ( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) > CASE( MOD( MONTH( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) + 6 - 1, 12 ) + 1, 2, 28, 4, 30, 6, 30, 9, 30, 11, 30, 31 ), 1, 0 ), 12 ) + 1, IF( DAY({!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) > CASE(MOD(MONTH({!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) + 6 - 1, 12 ) + 1, 2, 28, 4, 30, 6, 30, 9, 30, 11, 30, 31 ), 1, DAY( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) ) ), DATE( YEAR( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) + FLOOR( ( MONTH ( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) + 12 - 1 ) / 12 ), MOD( MONTH ( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) + 12 - 1 + IF( DAY ( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) > CASE( MOD( MONTH( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) + 12 - 1, 12 ) + 1, 2, 28, 4, 30, 6, 30, 9, 30, 11, 30, 31 ), 1, 0 ), 12 ) + 1, IF( DAY( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) > CASE( MOD( MONTH( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) + 12 - 1, 12 ) + 1, 2, 28, 4, 30, 6, 30, 9, 30, 11, 30, 31 ), 1, DAY( {!myVariable_current.Work_Completed_Date__c} ) ) ) )

value.stringValue: CONTAINS([Case].RecordType.Name, "Belliss") && ISCHANGED([Case].Status) && ISPICKVAL([Case].Status, "Closed") && [Case].Extended_Wear__c = TRUE && NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Belliss_Service_Type__c, 'Evaluation')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Belliss_Service_Type__c, 'Corrective Maintenance')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Belliss_Service_Type__c, 'Warranty')) && [Case].Re_opened__c = FALSE

Flow.label: Case - Clone Belliss Case
